descriptions:
Introducing the Yingzhao Set of 5 Poinsettia Christmas Wreaths, a delightful collection of festive decorations that will instantly fill your space with the holiday spirit! This set includes a beautifully crafted lighted wreath, 2 stunning garlands with lights, 2 elegant red bows, and a sturdy metal hanger to help you hang and display these pieces with ease.

The 17.72-inch diameter wreath is made from high-quality PE synthetic fir, providing a realistic and vibrant appearance. Adorned with charming pine cones and red berries, this wreath is sure to impress your guests. The warm yellow LED lights add a cozy glow to the wreath, creating a welcoming ambiance in any setting.

The 2 garlands in the set measure 106 inches in length and have a diameter of 10 inches. Each garland features 315 branch tips, adding to their full and voluminous appearance. The warm yellow LED lights are strategically placed along the garlands, providing a beautiful and festive touch to your space.

The 2 red bows included in the set have dimensions of 23.6 inches in width and 13.8 inches in height. These bows are perfect for adding a pop of color and tying together your holiday decor.

This set is perfect for a variety of spaces and occasions. Consider using these decorations for your front door, fireplace, Christmas tree, mantel, porch, cabinets, or shelves. They are also ideal for homes, shops, hotels, living rooms, and Christmas parties.

The Yingzhao Set of 5 Poinsettia Christmas Wreaths is battery operated, making it easy to use and set up without the need for any additional cords or plugs. This set is a must-have for anyone looking to create a warm and inviting holiday atmosphere in their space. Order yours today and get ready to enjoy the magic of the season!
